metadata.title: CVE-2024-36956 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal/debugfs: Free all thermal zone debug memory on zone removal Becausethermal_debug_tz_remove() does not free all memory allocated for thermalzone diagnostics, some of that memory becomes unreachable after freeing thethermal zone's struct thermal_debugfs object. Address this by makingthermal_debug_tz_remove() free all of the memory in question. Cc :6.8+<stable@vger.kernel.org> # 6.8+

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
